definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: As the temperature is below zero, the water pipe ruptured with the cold.
sentences.chinese: 气温已降到零度以下，水管冻裂了。

sentences.english: The temperature will stay above zero in the day-time , but at night it will fall below zero again.
sentences.chinese: 白天气温在零度以上，夜间又将降到零度以下。

sentences.english: The temperature will stay above zero in the day-time , but at night it will fall below zero again.
sentences.chinese: 白天气温在零度以上，夜间又将降到零度以下。
预计气温将在零度以下。

sentences.english: The nullity of a graph is the multiplicity of the eigenvalue zero in its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 图的零度是指在图的谱中特征值0的重数。

sentences.english: Merlin was also a zero-level Other, as was Jesus).
sentences.chinese: 梅林也是一个零度他者，跟耶稣一样。

sentences.english: Its lower fixed point is absolute zero.
sentences.chinese: 其低端固定点温度是绝对零度。

sentences.english: In Section 4, we study the nullity functions of poset matroids.
sentences.chinese: 在第4节研究了偏序集拟阵的零度函数。

sentences.english: The temperature will stay above zero in the day-time, but at night it will fall below zero again.
sentences.chinese: 白天气温在零度以上，夜间又降到零度以下。

sentences.english: The temperature will stay above zero in the day-time, but at night it will fall below zero again.
sentences.chinese: 白天气温在零度以上，夜间又降到零度以下。

sentences.english: The temperature inside is a few degrees above freezing.
sentences.chinese: 里面的温度零度以上几度。

sentences.english: Guess what the third law is going to tell us?
sentences.chinese: 它说绝对零度不可达到？

sentences.english: What weird behaviour can gases display near absolute zero?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的希奇古怪的行为可以气化显示接近绝对零度？

sentences.english: If you find 0 degrees "a little chilly", you live in Ontario .
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得零度刚“有点冷”，那你是住在安大略省。

sentences.english: These plants must be stored in the light at above freezing temperature.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物必须放置于零度以上光照充足的地方。
